pkgmetadata.longdescription: Uniformly Most Powerful Invariant Tests of Equivalence // Implementation of uniformly most powerful invariant equivalence tests for one- and two-sample problems (paired and unpaired) as described in Wellek (2010, ISBN:978-1-4398-0818-4). Also one- sided alternatives (non-inferiority and non-superiority tests) are supported. Basically a variant of a t-test with (relaxed) null and alternative hypotheses exchanged.
